title: Glazed Key Lime Bread Recipe
full_text:
Glazed Key Lime Bread Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
10 mins
Cook
50 mins
Active
20 mins
Total
60 mins
Serves
8
to 10 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
cup
plus
1
tablespoon
unsalted butter
at room temperature, divided
1 1/2
cups
all-purpose flour
1
teaspoon
baking soda
1/2
teaspoon
salt
2 1/4
tablespoons
poppy seeds
3/4
cup
sugar
3
eggs
1
teaspoon
vanilla extract
1/3 cup plus 2
tablespoons
freshly squeezed
key lime juice
, divided
2/3
cup
confectioners sugar
1
teaspoon
key lime zest
Directions
Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C). Grease loaf pan with 1 tablespoon butter. In a medium bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, salt, and poppy seeds.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed or in a stand mixer fitted with a whisk attachment, beat together remaining cup of butter and sugar until light and fluffy, about 4 minutes. Beat in eggs one at a time. Beat in vanilla and 1/3 cup key lime juice until combined. Add flour mixture to bowl and beat until just incorporated. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan, smooth top, and bake until a cake tester comes out clean, about 50 minutes.
Whisk together confectioners sugar, remaining 2 tablespoons key lime juice, and key lime zest until smooth. Pour glaze over bread while warm.
Special Equipment
10-inch loaf pan, handheld electric mixer or stand mixer
Desserts
Quick Breads
Lime
